event.title: Christmas drinks social
event.description:
To celebrate another great year of data events, a few drinks seemed in order. Heading to the Navy Volunteer on King Street.

All welcome, send me a message if you're not sure you'll be able to spot us, and we'll liaise to make sure you can find us :)

Also keep an eye out for details about a possible PyData talk and social on 19th December - we'll post a link to it on our meetup site when available...
